R35.nl_constraint: The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected

children.nl_constraint: The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6

content.text:
<documents>
<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

<information>
The user will give as input a natural language constraint that must be translated into PDDL3.0. The translation will be used by a PDDL planner.
</information>

<instructions> 
- Translate the input constraint into correct PDDL3.0.
- The resulting PDDL3.0 constraint must capture the same meaning as the initial input constraint.
- Remember that PDDL3.0 constraints are state-based. They can only refer to existing precates and fluents, thus, not to actions.
- Be sure to include temporal logic like operators in your translation.
- Format your answer such as there is no preambule and such that the PDDL translation is between the tags <pddl> and </pddl>.
</instructions>

<user_input>
The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6
</user_input>

The user wants me to translate the constraint "The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6" into PDDL3.0.

Let me analyze this:
1. The constraint is about a rock sample at waypoint6
2. It must "always remain" there - this suggests a temporal logic constraint that should hold throughout the execution
3. Looking at the domain, I can see there's a predicate `(at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)` 
4. In the problem instance, I can see `(at_rock_sample waypoint6)` is initially true
5. The constraint is saying this should always be true

In PDDL3.0, "always" constraints are expressed using the `(always ...)` temporal logic operator.

So the constraint should be:
`(always (at_rock_sample waypoint6))`

This means that throughout the entire execution of the plan, the predicate `(at_rock_sample waypoint6)` must remain true.

Looking at the domain, the only action that can change the `at_rock_sample` predicate is the `samplerock` action, which has the effect `(not (at_rock_sample ?p))`. So this constraint would prevent any rover from sampling the rock at waypoint6.

children.nl_constraint: No rover should ever obtain rock analysis data from waypoint6

<documents>
<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

<information>
The user will give as input a natural language constraint that must be translated into PDDL3.0. The translation will be used by a PDDL planner.
</information>

<instructions> 
- Translate the input constraint into correct PDDL3.0.
- The resulting PDDL3.0 constraint must capture the same meaning as the initial input constraint.
- Remember that PDDL3.0 constraints are state-based. They can only refer to existing precates and fluents, thus, not to actions.
- Be sure to include temporal logic like operators in your translation.
- Format your answer such as there is no preambule and such that the PDDL translation is between the tags <pddl> and </pddl>.
</instructions>

<user_input>
No rover should ever obtain rock analysis data from waypoint6
</user_input>

The user wants me to translate the constraint "No rover should ever obtain rock analysis data from waypoint6" into PDDL3.0.

Let me analyze this constraint:
- "No rover should ever" - this means for all rovers, at all times
- "obtain rock analysis data from waypoint6" - this refers to the predicate `have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint6`

In PDDL3.0, this would be a temporal logic constraint. Since it's "never", I need to use the "always" operator with negation.

The constraint should be:
- For all rovers r, it should always be the case that NOT (have_rock_analysis r waypoint6)

In PDDL3.0, this would be written as:
```
(always (forall (?r - rover) (not (have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint6))))
```

Let me double-check this:
- `always` means at all times
- `forall (?r - rover)` means for all rovers
- `not (have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint6)` means the rover r should not have rock analysis data from waypoint6

This captures the meaning that no rover should ever obtain rock analysis data from waypoint6.

<documents>
<pddl_domain>
;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain rover)
       (:requirements :typing :fluents)
       (:types
              rover -object
              waypoint -object
              store -object
              camera -object
              mode -object
              lander -object
              objective -object
       )
       (:predicates
              (in ?x - rover ?y - waypoint)
              (at_lander ?x - lander ?y - waypoint)
              (can_traverse ?r - rover ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?r - rover)
              (equipped_for_imaging ?r - rover)
              (empty ?s - store)
              (have_rock_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (have_soil_analysis ?r - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (full ?s - store)
              (calibrated ?c - camera ?r - rover)
              (supports ?c - camera ?m - mode)
              (available ?r - rover)
              (visible ?w - waypoint ?p - waypoint)
              (have_image ?r - rover ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (communicated_soil_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_rock_data ?w - waypoint)
              (communicated_image_data ?o - objective ?m - mode)
              (at_soil_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (at_rock_sample ?w - waypoint)
              (visible_from ?o - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (store_of ?s - store ?r - rover)
              (calibration_target ?i - camera ?o - objective)
              (on_board ?i - camera ?r - rover)
              (channel_free ?l - lander)
              (in_sun ?w - waypoint)
       )

       (:functions
              (energy ?r - rover)
              (recharges)
              (total-energy-used)
              (n_navigate ?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              (n_recharge ?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              (n_samplesoil ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_samplerock ?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              (n_drop ?x - rover ?y - store)
              (n_calibrate ?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              (n_takeimage ?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              (n_communicatesoildata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicaterockdata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              (n_communicateimagedata ?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
       )

       (:action navigate
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - waypoint ?z - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (can_traverse ?x ?y ?z) (available ?x) (in ?x ?y)
                     (visible ?y ?z) (>= (energy ?x) 8)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 8)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 8)
                     (not (in ?x ?y))
                     (in ?x ?z)
                     (increase (n_navigate ?x ?y ?z) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action recharge
              :parameters (?x - rover ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?w) (in_sun ?w) (<= (energy ?x) 80))
              :effect (and (increase (energy ?x) 20) (increase (recharges) 1)
                     (increase (n_recharge ?x ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplesoil
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?x) 3) (at_soil_sample ?p) (equipped_for_soil_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x) (empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 3)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 3)
                     (have_soil_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_soil_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplesoil ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action samplerock
              :parameters (?x - rover ?s - store ?p - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?x ?p) (>= (energy ?x) 5)
                     (at_rock_sample ?p) (equipped_for_rock_analysis ?x) (store_of ?s ?x)(empty ?s)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (not (empty ?s))
                     (full ?s)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 5)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 5)
                     (have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)
                     (not (at_rock_sample ?p))
                     (increase (n_samplerock ?x ?s ?p) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action drop
              :parameters (?x - rover ?y - store)
              :precondition (and (store_of ?y ?x) (full ?y) (>= (energy ?x) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (not (full ?y)) (empty ?y)
                     (increase (n_drop ?x ?y) 1)
                     (decrease (energy ?x) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action calibrate
              :parameters (?r - rover ?i - camera ?t - objective ?w - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (equipped_for_imaging ?r) (>= (energy ?r) 2)(calibration_target ?i ?t) (in ?r ?w) (visible_from ?t ?w)(on_board ?i ?r)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 2)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 2)
                     (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (increase (n_calibrate ?r ?i ?t ?w) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action takeimage
              :parameters (?r - rover ?p - waypoint ?o - objective ?i - camera ?m - mode)
              :precondition (and (calibrated ?i ?r)
                     (on_board ?i ?r)
                     (equipped_for_imaging ?r)
                     (supports ?i ?m)
                     (visible_from ?o ?p)
                     (in ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 1)
              )
              :effect (and (have_image ?r ?o ?m)
                     (not (calibrated ?i ?r))
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 1)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 1)
                     (increase (n_takeimage ?r ?p ?o ?i ?m) 1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicatesoildata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_soil_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
              )
              :effect (and (communicated_soil_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicatesoildata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicaterockdata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?p - waypoint ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_rock_analysis ?r ?p)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 4)
                     (visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_rock_data ?p)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 4)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 4)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicaterockdata ?r ?l ?p ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )

       (:action communicateimagedata
              :parameters (?r - rover ?l - lander ?o - objective ?m - mode ?x - waypoint ?y - waypoint)
              :precondition (and (in ?r ?x)
                     (at_lander ?l ?y)(have_image ?r ?o ?m)(visible ?x ?y)(available ?r)(channel_free ?l)
                     (>= (energy ?r) 6)
              )
              :effect (and
                     (communicated_image_data ?o ?m)(available ?r)
                     (decrease (energy ?r) 6)
                     (increase (total-energy-used) 6)
                     (increase
                            (n_communicateimagedata ?r ?l ?o ?m ?x ?y)
                            1)
              )
       )
)
</pddl_domain>

	(communicated_soil_data waypoint0)
	(communicated_soil_data waypoint3)
	(communicated_soil_data waypoint4)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint4)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint3)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint0)
	(communicated_rock_data waypoint1)
	(communicated_image_data objective3 colour)
	(communicated_image_data objective2 colour)
	(communicated_image_data objective3 lowres)
))

(:metric minimize (total-energy-used))

 
)
</pddl_problem>
</documents> 

<information>

<instructions> 
- Refine the user constraint to make it applicable to the given PDDL problem.
- You can rephrase and decompose the initial constraint into several other contraints.

- Constraints must be state-based and follow a Linear Temporal Logic. So constraints can't directly refer to actions.
- Avoid explicit PDDL language in your answer, the user can't understand PDDL.
- The set of all refined constraints must capture the meaning of the initial user constraint.

<user_input>
The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected
</user_input>

The user wants me to refine the constraint "The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected" to make it applicable to the given PDDL problem.

Let me analyze the PDDL problem first:
- There are rock samples at waypoints 0, 1, 3, 4, and 6
- The goal includes communicating rock data from waypoints 4, 3, 0, and 1 (but NOT waypoint 6)
- So the constraint makes sense - we don't want the rock sample at waypoint6 to be collected

Looking at the PDDL domain, when a rock sample is collected using the `samplerock` action, the effect includes:
- `(not (at_rock_sample ?p))` - the rock sample is no longer at that waypoint
- `(have_rock_analysis ?x ?p)` - the rover now has rock analysis from that waypoint

So the constraint "The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected" can be refined as:

1. The rock sample should always remain at waypoint6 (meaning `at_rock_sample waypoint6` should always be true)
2. No rover should ever have rock analysis data from waypoint6 (meaning `have_rock_analysis ?r waypoint6` should never be true for any rover)

These are complementary constraints that together ensure the rock sample at waypoint6 is never collected.

Wait, let me think about this more carefully. The constraint is state-based and should follow Linear Temporal Logic. The user constraint is "The rock sample at waypoint6 should never be collected".

In terms of states:
- Initially, `(at_rock_sample waypoint6)` is true
- If the rock sample is collected, then `(at_rock_sample waypoint6)` becomes false
- Also, if collected, some rover would have `(have_rock_analysis rover waypoint6)` become true

So the refined constraints could be:


I'll ensure the rock sample remains untouched by preventing any actions that would remove it from its original location. This means blocking collection attempts and maintaining its initial state throughout the mission's execution.

<constraints>
1. The rock sample must always remain at waypoint6
2. No rover should ever obtain rock analysis data from waypoint6
</constraints>

<explanation>
These two constraints work together to ensure the rock sample at waypoint6 is never collected. The first constraint ensures the physical sample stays in place, while the second prevents any rover from acquiring the analysis data that would result from collection.
</explanation>
